## Course Overview

<br>
[<img src="https://github.com/RockefellerUniversity/RU_reproducibleR/workflows/R-CMD-check-bioc/badge.svg">](https://github.com/RockefellerUniversity/RU_reproducibleR/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check-bioc)

This course introduces how to code in R in a reproducible way.

Course material is available as HTML presentations or single page document. An exercise is available at the end.

Course material and exercises are available to view as rendered HTML at https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/RU_reproducibleR/.
All material is available to download under GPL v2 license.
